short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will search lolalytics or u.gg for a character build in standard or ARAM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use a fast and easy browser extension to search for your favorite league of legends character builds from popular build sites! Just click a few buttons and do the thing
